string.name: terms
string.p: By signing up, you agree to our \n Terms of use and Privacy Policy

resources.string: Please enter your email address. You will receive a link to create a new password via email.

File uploading will carry on even if the app is in background. However, if you\ll close it fully (even from the background), it will kill the current file uploading thread and might re-initiate once the app is started again.
